Articles.Content:
Hello, Kerbals. I've been working on a series of cluster bombers. My bombs would consist of fuel tanks and liquid fuel nose cones (mods) all scaled down with tweak scale. My current bombs don't explode on contact with the ground as they did before. Instead they just crash into the ground and make some black smoke. Does anyone know why this is and how I can fix this?

Edit: When I check the logs it says that my parts are colliding into the surface instead of crashing.

Edited August 1, 2015 by lightrampage
